26213.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9445i","text":"Prepare either virus dilution (5.0e11-1.0e12) with PBS prepare or a dye aliquot. Injection is up to 200ul per mouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":68,"length":11}],"data":[]},{"key":"5u8ci","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"77ps7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"33abt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"E5948450B14B11E9B96A0D08C2589216","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/preparation-of-jf-dye-for-retro-orbital-injection-5u4g6yw"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"j864","text":"Take one mouse from the cage into an induction chamber and start isoflurane at 3% with flow rate of ~1L/min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c54hj","text":"After the mouse has slow breathing (~1/s) move the mouse to a nose cone delivery of isoflurane at 1.5% with around the same flow rate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9sk2","text":"Expose the eye ball with two fingers (above and below) and make sure the you are not pressing on the trachea and the mouse's breathing is regular.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f84jm","text":"Use a 29G syringe at a 30-degree angle beveled downwards until you hit the bone, retract a bit and slowly inject. See cited paper for more details.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7ikmb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"ct5h7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fjd40","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4qma0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"","data":{"align":null,"authors":"Tal Yardeni, Michael Eckhaus, H. Douglas Morris, Marjan Huizing, Shelley Hoogstraten-Miller","can_edit":1,"date":"1303303500","doi":"10.1038/laban0511-155","guid":"495DECDE341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","journal":"LabAnimal","protocol_name":"Estimation of small molecule dye delivery to the brain of C57/Bl mice","step_guid":"C987F740AEDC11E9989AEB8A1843E6DC","step_number":"5","title":"Retro-orbital injections in mice"}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"_public":"","align":"","can_edit":1,"cas_number":"","guid":"41ADED31341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"29G x 12.7mm 0.3ml syringe","protocol_name":"Estimation of small molecule dye delivery to the brain of C57/Bl mice","public":0,"reagent_vendor_link":"","rrid":"","sku":"09230","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"step_guid":"C987F740AEDC11E9989AEB8A1843E6DC","step_number":"5","url":"https://www.adwdiabetes.com/product/5741/ulticare-u100-pet-syringes-29g-0-3cc-12mm-29g","vendor":{"affiliation":null,"affiliations":[],"badges":[],"blocked_by_you":false,"blocked_you":false,"id":783,"image":{"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"link":"http://www.ulticare.com/","name":"Ulticare","research_interests":null,"username":null}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3dpso","text":"Remove the needle slowly and press the eyelid shut for a few seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7c397","text":"Validating the injection was successful is possible with JF525 by looking at the pee of the animal after it wakes up.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6cjam","text":"Leaving the animal in a clean cup with kim-wips will collect the pee and it would seem pink.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e97hr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_collections.title: Brain-wide delivery of Janelia Fluor HaloTag ligand dyes for tracking protein turnover in mice

status.info:
We use this protocol and it's working. Changed 200ul total to 100ul.
If need to do 200ul (200nmol dye), it is done with 100ul per eye
